login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Return to the app and take charge of your media again.
login.usernameError: Username can have a maximum of 32 alphanumeric characters!
login.passwordError: Password must contain at least 8 characters, uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character!
login.loginError: User with the given name and password does not exist. Please try again.
login.generalError: An error occurred during login. Please try again.
login.connectionLost: Connection to server lost. Please log in again when the connection is restored.

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Create an account to store and share your files securely.
register.usernameError: Username can have a maximum of 32 alphanumeric characters!
register.passwordError: Password must contain at least 8 characters, uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character!
register.userExistsError: User with the given name already exists. Choose a different username.
register.generalError: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.

fileUpload.title: Upload file
fileUpload.dragDropOrClick: Drag and drop file here or click to select
fileUpload.error: An error occurred during file upload

fileCard.noConnectionDelete: No internet connection. File deletion is only available online.
fileCard.noConnectionDownload: No internet connection. File download is only available online.

empty.noItemsFiltered: No items match the search criteria.

documentDialog.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching file data. Please try again.

imageDialog.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching file data. Please try again.

videoPlayer.networkError: Network error. Failed to load video.
videoPlayer.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while playing the video.

common.offlineError: No internet connection. This action is only available online.
common.offlineFileError: This type of resource can only be opened online.
common.authRequired: Authorization required. Please log in again.
common.forbidden: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
common.genericError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
common.fetchError: Failed to load files. Please try again.

folder.canCreate: Allow adding new files to the folder
folder.canDelete: Allow deleting files from the folder

errors.userNotFound: User with the given username does not exist.
